title: General Consultation
description: Book appointments with general practitioners for routine checkups and medical advice.

title: Laboratory Tests
description: Access a wide range of diagnostic and blood tests with easy result tracking.

title: Pharmacy
description: Order, refill, and manage prescriptions with doorstep delivery options.

title: Radiology & Imaging
description: Schedule X-rays, CT scans, MRIs, and other imaging services.

title: Dental Care
description: Book dental checkups, cleanings, and treatments with certified dentists.

title: Mental Health
description: Connect with therapists and mental health professionals for counseling and therapy sessions.

title: Maternity & Child Care
description: Get prenatal, postnatal, and pediatric healthcare support for mothers and children.

title: Emergency Services
description: Quick access to emergency contacts, ambulance services, and urgent care.

title: Vaccinations
description: View, schedule, and manage immunization records for all age groups.

title: Physiotherapy
description: Book sessions with physiotherapists to aid recovery and improve mobility.
